text: umbaata mulu loke watema yanna puluwan bawa...
langadima tawun eka hariya wenas wenawa...
ape shakthiya gam athule thibune nathnam shri lanipayata athwana iranama mokakda kiyala api dannawa.
eya merata parlimenthuwen sammatha karaganna laddaki
eheth ewan athinawina mrudukanga wisandumak pawa asamath we.
mema kabinat thirana danum dime madhya hamuwedi thawath wadagath deyak siduwiya.
pahadiliwa muladharmawadi wana wyaparayan gana salaka balime di pawa samaja sanrachakaya maganoharimata apa prawesham sahagatha wiya yuthu yi.
umbaata danena eka liwwata kamak naha, eeth me tharam wilambhitha liyanne nam oluwe amaru karayek misak yamak danna kenek nam wenna baha.
kathawe uchchathama awasthawata enawa wage hithenawa..eeth ethinnama mathu sambandhaya yayi damima gana balawath wirodhaya..
ee nisamado kohedo kenekge hitha dinaganna puluwan hondama drawyaya widiyata chokalat handunwannath kattiya pelambaila thiyenawa.
ee mudun pamunuwa ganimata, nayakaya durwalayeku kirima sandaha, wareka warnana karanu atha, thawath wareka alankrutha basin nayakathwaye guna wayima sandaha thaman wata sitina piris mehewanu atha.
api obe fantasiyata gal gasamu............
konduru thel hath pattaya soyanawatath wada amaruyi.
owunta wishwaya gana siyalu de danagannata haki weda?, eya kala hakida?
kewin bathmula kana athare me prawruththiya kiyawanu samipa dasun saha dura dasun mangin penwiya yuthuya..

eya watahena nuwana misa anekak nowe.apa gathkathuwarayanan ohuge gahaniyak keti katha sangrahaye anthargatha katha pilibandawa ehi katha praweshaye dakwanne mewan adahasaki.mehi hama katha wasthuwak jiwithayehi dushkara wu awasthawanta muhuna pamata sidu wu sthringeth purushayangeth kriyakalapayan owunge ee kriyawanta thududun chiththa ෙchethasika dharma samaja charithra yanadiyada nirupanaya karayi.samaja saththa yatharthawadaye parama aramuna wana manawa hithawadaya kumakdayi ‘mawa‘ ketikathawa kiyawana patakayage buddhindriyata nowa hrudrindriyata siyumwa danaweyi.“ane mage duwa mata nathiwata kamak naha.
rate yuda wiraya melesa yuddhaya dina wasarak giya thana koti hurathalek wuye keseda?
nala daru upathak yanu kumakda ?

aa thawa ekak...mata mathaka tharamin nam mama wadi bana kiyala naha newa..hama thanama bana katha agissatawath mama mehema kala yuthuyi kiyalawath..ee wayin aadarsha ganna kiyala kiwwayi kiyalawath mata mathaka naha.

apa aayathanaye amaru kalawaladi da me uththama puja wadasatahana pawathwimata da katayuthu kala.karthru mandala adhyaksha silarathna senarath, meheyum adhyaksha upul disanayaka, nithi adhyaksha rasanga harischandra, aayathana lekam kumudu gunawardhana mahathma mahathmihu athulu pirisak me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha..
eyin pas weni eka thamayi ewakata elis nagaraye rajathuma wunu "oogiyas" rajuge jarawasa wu sthala pirisudu kirima.
:) kit bit, sari bari, tayi bayi, silin bilin kellata kiyala denna ooni sissaththeta liyanna yugala pada walata..
sangam ha waidya niladharin pawasa sitinne aanduwa ee dun prathignyawa pahara harimata sarasena bawayi.

anna ee ganawala ayagen dewa ganaye minissunta holman penawalu eeth eyala baya wenne nathilu....manussa ganaye ayalu baya wela eka eka karadara walata path wenne...raksha ganaye ayata holman penne nathilu.........

owun wenuwen sathipatha punchi welawak gatha karanawa, pindena karyaya wenuwen.
emenma mahacharyawaraya wisin nirantharayenma shishyawa prathikshepa karanne da ohuge pawulata saha ayage anagathayata eyin athwiya haki bhayanaka iranama pilibadandawa sihipath karamin ya.
ehidi adala durakathana sanwadawala handapata owunge katahada sampala samanga galapena bawata da thorathuru anawaranaya wi thibuni.

mathdrawya jawarama, minimarum, sthridushana, mulya wancha, pathala aparadha athulu wiwidha aakaraye bhayanaka aparadha sidukara meratin wiyatnamayata panagena sitina aparadhakaruwo athadanguwata ganima saha wiyatnama adhikaranayen danduwam laba erata siradanduwam windina shri lankika sirakaruwan meratata baradima sandaha wiyatnama rajaya piyawara gena thibe.ee athara ihatha sandahan aakarayema wiwidha aparadha sidukara meratata panagena sitina wiyatnama aparadhakaruwan athadanguwata ganime meheyum merata polisiya manginda aarambha kere.me aakaraye aparadha sidukala aparadhakaruwan wishala pirisak mema derata thula kalayak thisse sangawi sitina bawata saha siradanduwam windina bawata deratema jathyanthara polisiya mangin thahawuru karagena thibe.eheth mowun athadanguwata gena nila washayen ema ratawal wala rajayan wetha bara dima sandaha methek giwisumak nothibini.

nawasilanthaya 183-10 ostreliyawa 186-3 wasara 23kata pasu shri lankawa ostreliyawa haleyi wasara 23 kata pasu enam 1996 n pasu sinhayan saha kangaruwan nomathi krikat loka kusalana awasana maha tharagaya mewara kiwiyan saha sathkaraka hiru nobasina adhirajya hewath engalanthaya athara pawathweyi. 1996 shri lankawa - ostreliyawa (jaya shri lankawa), 1999 ostreliyawa - pakisthanaya (jaya ostreliyawa), 2003 ostreliyawa - indiyawa (jaya ostreliyawa), 2007 shri lankawa - ostreliyawa (jaya ostreliyawa), 2011 shri lankawa - indiyawa (jaya indiyawa), 2015 ostreliyawa - nawasilanthaya (jaya ostreliyawa) pawathi awasan maha tharaga atharin mewara shri lankawata saha oostreliyawata awasan maha tharagaya ahimi wi giyeya.
